text:
Seungcheol menurunkan Jihoon agar duduk di kasur dan memintanya mengangkang, sedangkan dirinya duduk tepat di depan paha mulus milik kekasihnya itu.
"Cantiknya aku." kata Seungcheol sambil dirinya menghirup wangi sabun bercampur keringat yang menempel pekat di paha mulus Jihoon. Yang menjadi sasaran mulut nakal Seungcheol sudah melenguh inginkan lebih dari sekedar icip dan kecup yang dilakukan Seungcheol pada bagian tubuhnya.
Terbukti dengan Jihoon yang menarik rambut Seungcheol agar tetap pada posisinya, seakan tak membiarkannya berpaling pada yang lain.
“Becek banget sayang.” Seungcheol dengan gemas menggesekan hidungnya di area sekitar vaginanya.
“Kalau aku jilat munctrat kali ya.”
Jihoon menggigit bibir bawahnya, ia coba menunduk dan melihat jelas Seungcheol sedang menatapnya di sela-sela pahanya, meminta persetujuan, lalu ia mengangguk. Jihoon ingin lebih dari ini, Jihoon ingin sampai ke surga itu.
trans:
Seungcheol put down Jihoon so she could sit on the mattress and asked her to straddle, while he sat right in front of the smooth thighs of his lover.
"Oh, my, so pretty." said Seungcheol while inhaling the scent of soap mixed with sweat sticking tightly on Jihoon's smooth thighs. Those were the targets of Seungcheol's nasty mouth that sighed, wanting more than just the touches and kisses made by him on the parts of her body.
It was proven by Jihoon who pooled Seungcheol's hair so that he remained on his position, as if not letting him to turn to someone else.
"It's so wet, baby." Seungcheol rubbed his nose in the area around her vagina with excitement.
"If I lick on it, I think it will squirt, right?"
Jihoon bit her lower lip, she tried to look down and saw clearly that Seungcheol was staring between her thighs, asking for her consent, then she nodded. Jihoon wanted more that this, he wanted to reach that heaven.
